Data: {"recipient_id": "2fa76ea4-13e4-4394-b67c-7cdebf1f5812", "custom": {"attachment": {"type": "template", "payload": {"template_type": "simple_form", "title": "Information for Ad Support Ticket", "description": "This form is used to collect user information in case the user needs additional help and a Jira Ticket needs to be filed with our Support Team.", "descriptionPosition": "top", "hidden_reply": true, "reply_text": "The user completes the submission of the form", "submit_button_title": "Send", "intent_name": "submit_form", "cancel_button": {"title": "Cancel", "type": "postback", "payload": "/cancel_for_input_data", "url": null, "is_enabled": false, "hidden_reply": true}, "is_mailerlite_form": false, "fields": [{"title": "Name", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-name.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_NAME"}, {"title": "Email", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-email.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_EMAIL"}, {"title": "Account ID", "type": "text", "icon_url": "", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "VAR_0001"}], "form_id": "ee27568f0b9f4826a7215c8197548501"}}}}

Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
Hi! I dont receive an answer from the support for more than a month ( <kaitlyn.mulliken@newsbreak.com>)

Hi there! I'm sorry to hear that you haven't received a response from support. Please note that the correct email for News Break support is adsupport@newsbreak.com. I recommend reaching out to them directly at this email address for assistance. Let me know if there's anything else I can help with!
hi, where can i find my organisation ID for my API token?

Hi! To find your organization ID for your API token, you need to log in to the Newsbreak Admanager Platform. Once logged in, navigate to Tools - Resources - API Access Tokens. If you have any trouble, feel free to ask!

No, the 'Access' column is used for managing user access within your organization. To find your organization ID for the API token, you should look under Tools - Resources - API Access Tokens in the Newsbreak Admanager Platform.
i am exactly there, theres is no organization id

If you're unable to find your Organization ID in the specified section, I recommend reaching out to our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com. They can assist you in locating your Organization ID. Let me know if there's anything else I can help with!
